review_body: The hotel itself was good, very friendly staff they had everything we needed no problems with wifi, housekeeping were excellent. Rooms in tokyo are mostly 11 or 12sq meters and thats a bit small for 2 people with suitcases but this hotel has larger rooms much more pleasant for 2 people. Getting to shinjuku or shibuya from yotsua is very simple i would be happy to return to this hotel again.

The room maybe smal but vry comfortabel, and love the shower/bathroom area. The TV choice could be more international. There are limited hotek services, but we only needed the room stay so al was good.Staff very welcoming and helpful. Hotel is located close to Yotsuya station. There are numerous Bars, cafes and restaurants nearby. I wil stay here again.

Staff were always very welcoming. Hotel is located two minutes from Yotsuya station. Bars, restaurants and supermarkets across the street, very convenient. Clean room, good size for Tokyo standards. Restaurant downstairs looked great although we didnâ€™t have a chance to eat there during our trip.
